amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 115-235 to clarify the applicability of the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 (NEPA) to projects affected by the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Gene amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Green, Gene.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Green, Gene.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Green, Gene amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
